attributes.action: FIND ME A GIRLFRIEND I'M DESPERATE!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MY NAME IS MARCUS PRESCOTT AND I LOOK LIKE TERRY TIBBS OF PHONEJACKER AND I'M IN DESPERATE NEED OF A GIRLFRIEND! PLEASE HELP IT'S BEEN YEARS SINCE I'VE FELT THE LOVE OF A GOOD WOMEN!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
